mean_en: the part of an army that in the past had soldiers who rode horses and that now has soldiers who ride in vehicles or helicopters
sentence: The sound of running horses thundered across the battlefield as the cavalry arrived.
sentence_trans: 骑兵到达的时候，奔跑的战马声响彻整个战场。
word_etyma: caval马 ＋ ry表名词 → cavalry骑兵
